alert.note: Alert for Klamath Basin (Oregon) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Medford (Southwest Oregon and Northern California)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 26 at 11:34AM PST until December 27 at 10:00PM PST by NWS Medford
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT FROM 10 PM THIS EVENING TO 10 PM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...In California, northeast Siskiyou and northwest Modoc Counties. In Oregon, the Klamath Basin. This includes highways 97, 140, 62 and 66 and the communities of Klamath Falls, Keno, Chiloquin, Macdoel and Tulelake. * WHEN...From 10 PM this evening to 10 PM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. * View the hazard area in detail at https://www.wrh.noaa.gov/map/?wfo=mfr
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
